proficiencies: Proficient With Light Armor, Heavy Armor, Weapons
Proficient With Light Armor, Heavy Armor, Weapons
Proficient With Light Armor, Heavy Armor, Weapons

cleric: When you visit a trader, display an additional card on that trader.
On your check against a card that has the Obstacle trait, you may add your Divine skill.
On your check against a card that has the Obstacle (or Trap) trait, you may add your Divine skill.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar (or Wadjet) trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead.
keymaster: When you visit a trader, display an additional card on that trader.
On your check against a card that has the Obstacle trait, you may add your Divine skill.
On your check against a card that has the Obstacle (or Trap) trait, you may add your Divine skill.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar (or Wadjet) trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar trait to add dice to a check (or to explore a location), you may recharge it instead.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar (or Wadjet) trait to add dice to a check (or to explore a location), you may recharge it instead.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead (and add 1 additional dice).
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar (or Wadjet) trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead (and add 1 additional dice).
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar trait to add dice to a check (or to explore a location), you may recharge it instead (and add 1 additional dice).
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar (or Wadjet) trait to add dice to a check (or to explore a location), you may recharge it instead (and add 1 additional dice).
After you defeat a barrier with the Obstacle trait on your exploration, you may explore your location.
After you defeat a barrier with the Obstacle (or Trap) trait on your exploration, you may explore your location.
At the start of your turn, you may discard the top card of your deck to allow a character at your location to recharge a random card from her discard pile for each card discarded.

At the start of your turn, you may discard the top card of (or any number of cards from) your deck to allow a character at your location to recharge a random card from her discard pile for each card discarded.

At the start of your turn, you may discard the top card of your deck to allow a character at your location to recharge a random card from her discard pile for each card discarded. (Characters gain this power while at your location.)

At the start of your turn, you may discard the top card of (or any number of cards from) your deck to allow a character at your location to recharge a random card from her discard pile for each card discarded. (Characters gain this power while at your location.)
vaultkeeper: When you visit a trader, display an additional card on that trader.
On your check against a card that has the Obstacle trait, you may add your Divine skill.
On your check against a card that has the Obstacle (or Trap) trait, you may add your Divine skill.
On your check against a card that has the Obstacle (or Trap)(or Lock) trait, you may add your Divine skill.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead.
When you would discard a blessing that has the Abadar (or Wadjet) trait to add dice to a check, you may recharge it instead.
Add 1d6 to your check to acquire a boon or your check to close a location.
Add 1d6 to your check to acquire a boon (then you may give it to another character) or your check to close a location.
Add 1d6 to your check to acquire a boon or your check to close a location. (You may automatically fulfill the requirements to temporarily close your location.)

Add 1d6 to your check to acquire a boon (then you may give it to another character) or your check to close a location. (You may automatically fulfill the requirements to temporarily close your location.)
When you defeat a card that has the Lock or Trap trait, you may examine the top 3 cards of your location deck and put them back in any order.
When you defeat (or a character at your location defeats) a card that has the Lock or Trap trait, you may examine the top 3 cards of your location deck and put them back in any order.
When you encounter a card, before you act, you may recharge a card that has the Abadar trait to draw a random weapon, armor, or item from the box. After you act, banish that card.
When you encounter a card, before you act, you may recharge a card that has the Abadar (or Divine) trait to draw a random weapon, armor, or item from the box. After you act, banish that card.
